description.brazilian: Jogou X Invader pela primeira vez!
description.english: Played X Invader for the first time!
description.french: Tu as joué à X Invader pour la première fois !
description.german: X Invader zum ersten Mal gespielt!
description.schinese: 首次运行X Invader。
description.spanish: ¡Has jugado a X Invader por primera vez!
description.tchinese: 首次執行X Invader！

description.brazilian: Derrotou Sandring & Powpow.
description.english: Defeated Sandring & Powpow.
description.french: Tu as vaincu Sandring & Powpow.
description.german: Sandring & Pengpeng besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服桑德琳。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Sandring y Powpow.
description.tchinese: 你已征服桑德琳。

description.brazilian: Derrotou Levatein.
description.english: Defeated Levatein.
description.french: Tu as battu Levatein.
description.german: Levatin besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服拉维汀。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Levatein.
description.tchinese: 你已征服拉維汀。

description.brazilian: Derrotou Parasolime.
description.english: Defeated Parasolime.
description.french: Tu as battu Parasolime.
description.german: Paraschleim besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服帕拉史莱姆。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Parasolima.
description.tchinese: 你已征服帕拉史萊姆。

displayName.french: Le secret de la vie éternelle (?)
displayName.spanish: El secreto de la vida eterna (¿?)

description.brazilian: Obteve todos os dados secretos da Parasol Corporation.
description.english: Gained all of Parasol Corporation’s secret data.
description.french: Tu as récupéré toutes les données secrètes de Parasol Corporation.
description.german: Alle geheimen Daten der Sonnenschirm AG erlangt.
description.koreana: 파라솔 코퍼레이션의 비밀 데이터를 모두 획득했다.
description.schinese: 获得遮阳伞公司所有的机密数据。
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los datos secretos de Sociedad Parasol.
description.tchinese: 你已獲得所有遮陽傘公司的秘密數據。

description.brazilian: Derrotou Spawn G Bomb.
description.english: Defeated Spawn G Bomb.
description.french: Tu as battu Spawn G Bomb.
description.german: Spawn-G-Bombe besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服Spawn G Bomb。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Genera-Bomba G.
description.tchinese: 你已征服Spawn G Bomb。

description.brazilian: Derrotou PeaceMaker.
description.english: Defeated PeaceMaker.
description.french: Tu as battu PeaceMaker.
description.german: Friedensstifter besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服和平制造者。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Pacifista.
description.tchinese: 你已征服和平製造者。

description.brazilian: Derrotou BF-Fist.
description.english: Defeated BF-Fist.
description.french: Tu as battu BF-Fist.
description.german: BF-Faust besiegt.
description.schinese: 成功征服B.F-Fist。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Puño-BF.
description.tchinese: 你已征服B.F-Fist。

description.brazilian: Espionagem Industrial
description.english: Gained all of Spark in the Street’s secret data.
description.french: Tu as récupéré toutes les données secrètes de Spark in the Street.
description.german: Alle geheimen Daten der Funkenstraße AG erlangt.
description.koreana: 스파크 인 더 스트릿의 비밀 데이터를 모두 획득했다.
description.schinese: 获得街头花火公司所有的机密数据。
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los datos secretos de Chispa Callejera.
description.tchinese: 你已獲得所有街頭花火公司的秘密數據。

description.brazilian: Concluiu o Sistema de Segurança Nv. 9 da Parasol Corporation
description.english: Completed Parasol Corporation’s Level 9 Security System.
description.french: Tu as vaincu le système de sécurité niveau 9 de Parasol Corporation.

description.schinese: 破解遮阳伞公司的9级安全屏障。
description.spanish: Has completado el sistema de seguridad de nivel 9 de Sociedad Parasol.
description.tchinese: 已解除遮陽傘公司的9級安全級別。

description.tchinese: 購買代碼切割器。

description.tchinese: 購買疫苗破壞器。

displayName.english: Can I Use This To Remove Hair?
displayName.french: Est-ce que je peux l'utiliser pour m'épiler ?
displayName.spanish: ¿Puedo usar esto para eliminar el vello?

description.brazilian: Compre o E-laser.
description.english: Buy the E-Laser.
description.french: Achète le E-Laser.

description.tchinese: 購買E-雷射器。

displayName.tchinese: 傳說中注入靈魂的編碼

description.brazilian: Obtenha o seu primeiro Código-Alma
description.english: Acquire your first Soul Code.
description.french: Obtiens ton premier Code d'âme

description.spanish: Consigue tu primero Código de alma.
description.tchinese: 首次獲得靈魂編碼。

displayName.german: Sieh mal, wie groß du geworden bist!
displayName.tchinese: 看看你，都長這麼大了呢！

description.tchinese: 你已獲得所有亞當商店的升級。

description.brazilian: Adam roubou seus dados.
description.english: Data was stolen by Adam.

description.tchinese: 被亞當偷走了數據。

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Adam no Nível de Segurança 15 da Allaf Company.
description.english: Defeated Adam at security level 15 in Allaf Company.
description.french: J'ai vaincu Adam au niveau de sécurité 15 de Allaf Company.
description.german: Habe Adam auf Sicherheitsstufe 15 bei Allaf AG besiegt.
description.schinese: 在奥拉夫公司安全级别15中击败了亚当。
description.spanish: Eliminé a Adam en el nivel de seguridad 15 de Grupo Allaf.
description.tchinese: 在奧拉夫公司安全級別15擊敗了亞當。

description.brazilian: Você derrotou Adam no Nível de Segurança 15 em todos os mapas e retornou ao esconderijo.
description.english: Defeated Adam at security level 15 on allaf company and returned to the hideout.
description.french: J'ai vaincu Adam au niveau de sécurité 15 de toutes les cartes et suis retourné au repaire.
description.german: Habe Adam auf Sicherheitsstufe 15 auf allen Karten besiegt und bin zur Basis zurückgekehrt.
description.koreana: 올라프컴퍼니 보안레벨 15에서 아담을 처치하고 아지트로 귀환했다.
description.schinese: 在所有地图的安全级别15中击败了亚当，并返回了据点。
description.spanish: Eliminé a Adam en el nivel de seguridad 15 de todos los mapas y regresé a la base.
description.tchinese: 在所有地圖的安全級別15擊敗了亞當，並返回了基地。

description.brazilian: Você comprou o Esmagador de CPU.
description.english: Purchased the CPU Breaker.
description.french: J'ai acheté le Briseur de CPU.
description.german: Habe den CPU-Brecher gekauft.
description.schinese: 购买了CPU粉碎机。
description.spanish: Compré el Rompedor de CPU.
description.tchinese: 購買了CPU破解者。
